
Causal Learning (CL)
====================

The Causal Learning module identifies causal relationships using various algorithms optimized for the data.

Main Class
----------

- `CausalLearner <causal_learning.CausalLearner>`_

Available Algorithms
--------------------

- **PC Algorithm**
- **FCI**
- **GFCI**
- **FGES**
- **DirectLiNGAM**

Classes
-------

- `CausalLearner <causal_learning.CausalLearner>`_
- `CLConfiguration <causal_learning.CLConfiguration>`_
